about_the_game:
Years ago, your mentor and gentleman scientist Dr. A. Priori said that he would one day need your help, and that day has finally arrived. You've received a letter from the Professor asking you to finish what he could not. But finish what? And what are these strange devices?

Explore a whole building and unlock rooms full of mysteries. Use time bubbles to change the environment and solve puzzles. Unravel the mystery!

Play this first-person puzzle escape room game solo or co-op with up to 4 players.
detailed_description:
Years ago, your mentor and gentleman scientist Dr. A. Priori said that he would one day need your help, and that day has finally arrived. You've received a letter from the Professor asking you to finish what he could not. But finish what? And what are these strange devices?

Explore a whole building and unlock rooms full of mysteries. Use time bubbles to change the environment and solve puzzles. Unravel the mystery!

Play this first-person puzzle escape room game solo or co-op with up to 4 players.
name: Dr. Priori’s Time Escape Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: x64-based processor
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Video card with 1024MB of VRAM
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or higher
  • Processor: x64-based processor
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Video card with 1024MB of VRAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

short_description: Welcome back to the Curiosity Shop of Dr. A. Priori. Explore the building and unlock rooms full of mysteries. Use time bubbles to change the environment and solve puzzles. Unravel the mystery! Play this first-person puzzle escape room game solo or co-op with up to 4 players.
